availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frederick Yanner (Resident of Jefferson County and Frankfort)

body.p: Resident of Jefferson County, Kentucky. Married to Mary Schmitt Yanner. Stepfather of Anna Smith and Henrietta Smith. Convicted of rape of his step-daughter, Anna, and served four years of ten-year sentence for rape in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort, Kentucky.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 468; KYR-0001-029-0502; KYR-0001-020-1447.
